name: GROTTO GO FAST!!!
description:
Grotto Go Fast takes you deeper and deeper thru an 8 track "underground" racing circuit!Each track increases in difficulty as you race along narrow ledges, dodge boulders, oil slicks, spikes, and stalactites. 

Made for Ludum Dare 48 with the theme "deeper and deeper."
Best played in fullscreen mode.

Controls - Keyboard or Gamepad

Keyboard - W to accelerate, S to brake, A/D to steer.

Gamepad - B to accelerate, X to brake, L/R d-pad to steer.

This game was inspired by the SNES classic "Super Off-road."
